posts.post_content: After seeing this in action in limited, I regret letting the second one pass me by. Brutal in Red/White with [Rally the Peasants](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rally the Peasants) on attack or defense (yay first strike!). posts.post_content: Almost strictly better than [thunder spirit](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=thunder spirit) due to the less restricting mana cost and the fact that first strike does a good deal of negating the one less toughness (but not completely due to [geistflame](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=geistflame) and company). Much more flavorful though. Thunder Spirit is one of those cards that I never really understood why it's so expensive.
